scripts.build: TMP_VAR_NAME=GPT_VERSION_$STAGE && COMBINED_GPT_VERSION=${!TMP_VAR_NAME} && npm run prepair-build && tsc && esbuild ./dist/bot-intercept.js --bundle --minify --platform=node --define:process.env.DOMAIN=\"$DOMAIN\" --define:process.env.TITLE_TABLE=\"btcfix-be-$STAGE-title\" --define:process.env.LANGUAGE_TABLE=\"btcfix-be-$STAGE-language\" --define:process.env.AFFILIATION_ISSUE_CACHE_TABLE=\"btcfix-be-$STAGE-affiliation-issue-cache\" --define:process.env.OPENAI_API_KEY=\"$OPENAI_API_KEY\" --define:process.env.GPT_VERSION=\"$COMBINED_GPT_VERSION\" --outfile=./dist/bundle.js
